text: The CECAFA U-20 Championship is a football (soccer) tournament in Africa. It is organised by the Council of East and Central Africa Football Associations (CECAFA), and includes national under 20 teams from Central and East Africa. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" border="1" width="500px" |- !
